$:/plugins/nico/pm/macros/project.text:
\define archive-project() <$fieldmangler> <$button class="pm-btn btn-danger nc-archive-project"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="Archived"/> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} Archive project \end \define restore-project() <$fieldmangler> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param="Archived"/> Restore project \end \define todo-list-all(tag emptyMessage:"") <> \end \define todo-list(tag emptyMessage:"''üôå All done!''") <> \end \define todo-list-completed(tag) <$list filter="[!has[draft.of]tag[$tag$]status[done]sort[created]]" template="$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/CompletedTodoTemplate"/> \end \define todo-list-later(tag) <$list filter="[!has[draft.of]tag[$tag$]status[later]sort[created]]" template="$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/TodoTemplate"/> \end \define todo-list-cancelled(tag) <$list filter="[!has[draft.of]tag[$tag$]status[cancelled]sort[created]]" template="$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/TodoTemplate"/> \end \define new-todo-button(tag label) <$button class="pm-btn"> <$action-setfield $field="status" value="todo"/> {{$:/core/images/list-bullet}} $label$ \end \define todo-count(tag) <$list filter="[tag[$tag$]!has[draft.of]status[todo]count[]]">{{!!title}} / <$list filter="[tag[$tag$]!has[draft.of]count[]]">{{!!title}} \end \define project-with-tag(tag newTodoLabel:"Add a todo") <$list filter="[is[current]tag[Archived]]">
This project is archived. <$macrocall $name="restore-project"/>
<$list filter="[is[current]!tag[Archived]]"> <$keyboard key="enter"> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/state/$tag$!!todo_name}} tags="[[$tag$]]" status="todo"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/$tag$" todo_name=""/> <$edit-text class="pm-input" tiddler="$:/state/$tag$" field="todo_name" placeholder="Add to $tag$..."/>

Todos <$macrocall $name="todo-count" tag="$tag$"/>

<$macrocall $name="todo-list-all" tag="$tag$"/>
<$list filter="[is[current]!tag[Archived]]"> <$macrocall $name="archive-project"/> \end \define project() <$macrocall $name="project-with-tag" tag={{!!title}}/> \end
$:/plugins/nico/pm/macros/project.title: $:/plugins/nico/pm/macros/project

$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Inbox.text:
\define inbox-count() <$list filter="[tag[Inbox]!has[draft.of]count[]]">{{!!title}} \end

Inbox <$macrocall $name="inbox-count"/>

<$keyboard key="enter"> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/state/Inbox!!todo_name}} tags="Inbox" status="todo"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/Inbox" todo_name=""/> <$edit-text class="pm-input" tiddler="$:/state/Inbox" field="todo_name" placeholder="Add to inbox..."/> <$macrocall class="nc-inbox-input" $name="todo-list-all" tag="Inbox" emptyMessage="Welcome to the desert of the real."/>
$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Inbox.title: $:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Inbox
$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Inbox.caption: {{$:/plugins/nico/pm/images/inbox}} Inbox

$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Projects.text:
\define refile-inbox-actions() <$fieldmangler tiddler=<>> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param=<>/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param="Inbox"/> \end

Projects

    <$list filter="[tag[Project]!title[Inbox]!tag[Archived]]"> <$droppable actions=<>>
  • <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/> <$macrocall $name="todo-count" tag={{!!title}}/>
<$button class="pm-btn btn-primary"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" tags="Project" text="<>"/> {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} New project or <$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/pm-show-archived" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" set="$:/state/pm-show-archived" setTo="show"> Show archived <$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/pm-show-archived" text="show"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" set="$:/state/pm-show-archived" setTo=""> Hide archived

Archive

    <$list filter="[tag[Project]!title[Inbox]tag[Archived]]" emptyMessage="No archived project yet.">
  • <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/> <$macrocall $name="todo-count" tag={{!!title}}/>
$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Projects.title: $:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Projects
$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Projects.caption: {{$:/plugins/nico/pm/images/tasks}} Projects

$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Schedule.text:
\define schedule-today()
  <$list filter="[!has[draft.of]status[todo]days:due[0]]" template="$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/TodoTemplate" emptyMessage="üåû All clear!"/>
\end

\define schedule-range(start end)
  <$list filter="[!has[draft.of]status[todo]!days:due[$start$]days:due[$end$]sort[due]]" template="$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/TodoTemplate" emptyMessage="üåû All clear!"/>
\end

\define schedule-overdue()
  <$list filter="[!has[draft.of]status[todo]!days:due[-1]sort[due]]" template="$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/TodoTemplate"/>
\end

<$list filter="[!has[draft.of]status[todo]!days:due[-1]limit[1]]">

  !! Overdue

  <<schedule-overdue>>

</$list>

!! Today

<<schedule-today>>

!! Next 7 days

<<schedule-range 1 7>>

!! Next 30 days

<<schedule-range 7 30>>

!! Someday

<<todo-list-later>>
$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Schedule.title: $:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Schedule
$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Schedule.caption: {{$:/plugins/nico/pm/images/calendar-check}} Schedule

$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/TodoDueDateTemplat.text: <$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!due" text=""> <$edit-date tag="span" field="due" icon="$:/plugins/nico/pm/images/calendar-check" /> Due <$view field="due" format="date" template="DDth mmm"/>. <$button tag="a"><$action-deletefield $field="due" />Clear <$list filter="[all[current]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]!days:due[-1]]"> <$view field="due" format="relativedate"/> <$reveal type="match" state="!!due" text=""> <$edit-date tag="span" field="due" icon="$:/plugins/nico/pm/images/calendar-check" /> Schedule
$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/TodoDueDateTemplat.title: $:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/TodoDueDateTemplate

$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/TodoTemplate.text:
<$reveal type="match" state="!!status" text="todo">
<$checkbox actions="<$action-setfield $field='status' $value='done'/>"> {{||$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/CheckboxTemplate}} <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/> {{||$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/TodoDueDateTemplate}}
<$reveal type="match" state="!!status" text="later">
<$checkbox actions="<$action-setfield $field='status' $value='cancelled'/>"> {{||$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/CheckboxTemplate}} <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/> {{||$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/TodoDueDateTemplate}}
<$reveal type="match" state="!!status" text="done">
<$checkbox actions="<$action-setfield $field='status' $value='later'/>"> {{||$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/CheckboxTemplate}} <$link to={{!!title}}>~~<$view field="title"/>~~
<$reveal type="match" state="!!status" text="cancelled">
<$checkbox actions="<$action-setfield $field='status' $value='todo'/>"> {{||$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/CheckboxTemplate}} <$link to={{!!title}}>~~<$view field="title"/>~~
$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/TodoTemplate.title: $:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/TodoTemplate

$:/plugins/nico/pm/stylesheet.title: $:/plugins/nico/pm/stylesheet

$:/plugins/nico/pm/usage.text:
! How to display the project dashboard

The main entry point to the Project Manager plugin is the dashboard.
The dashboard can be embedded ([[transcluded|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Transclusion]]) in any tiddler using the following:

```
{{$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Dashboard}}
```
<$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/pm-usage-show-dashboard" text="show">
  <$button class="pm-btn btn-primary" set="$:/state/pm-usage-show-dashboard" setTo="">Hide</$button>
  <hr/>
  {{$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Dashboard}}
  <hr/>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/state/pm-usage-show-dashboard" text="show">
  <$button class="pm-btn btn-primary" set="$:/state/pm-usage-show-dashboard" setTo="show">Show result</$button>
</$reveal>

! How to add extra tabs to the Dashboard

Any tiddler with the tag <<tag $:/plugins/nico/pm/tags/dashboard>> will be displayed as a tab in the dashboard.

! What if I want to display the Inbox in a separate tab?

You can build your own Dashboard using the following:

```
<<tabs "$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Inbox $:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Projects $:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Schedule" "$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Inbox" "$:/state/pm-custom-dashboard"  "pm-tabs">>
```
<$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/pm-usage-custom-dashboard" text="show">
  <$button class="pm-btn btn-primary" set="$:/state/pm-usage-custom-dashboard" setTo="">Hide</$button>
  <hr/>
  <<tabs "$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Inbox $:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Projects $:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Schedule" "$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Inbox" "$:/state/pm-custom-dashboard"  "pm-tabs">>
  <hr/>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/state/pm-usage-custom-dashboard" text="show">
  <$button class="pm-btn btn-primary" set="$:/state/pm-usage-custom-dashboard" setTo="show">Show result</$button>
</$reveal>

! Can I make sub-projects?

Yes, any todo (or tiddler, for that matter) can be used as a project using the `<<project>>` macro.
This means that you can effectively make any todo a sub-project of another project, and go as deep as you wish!

Note that only tiddlers with the <<tag Project>> tag will be listed in the Dashboard.

```
<<project>>
```
<$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/pm-usage-subproject" text="show">
  <$button class="pm-btn btn-primary" set="$:/state/pm-usage-subproject" setTo="">Hide</$button>
  <hr/>
  <<project>>
  <hr/>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/state/pm-usage-subproject" text="show">
  <$button class="pm-btn btn-primary" set="$:/state/pm-usage-subproject" setTo="show">Show result</$button>
</$reveal>

! Can I quickly capture todos to my inbox?

''Yes!'' The default shortcut is {{$:/config/shortcuts/pm-quick-capture}}, but you can change it in the [[Keyboard section of the Control Panel|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts]].

! Can I easily move todos out of the inbox?

Yes, just drag a todo from the inbox into one of the projects.
$:/plugins/nico/pm/usage.title: $:/plugins/nico/pm/usage
$:/plugins/nico/pm/usage.caption: Usage & Help

$:/plugins/nico/pm/installation.text:
! Dependencies

Project-Manager depends on the following plugins:

* [[$:/plugins/kixam/moment]]
* [[$:/plugins/kixam/datepicker]]

Install these plugins by dragging the above links to your wiki.

While not strictly required, we strongly recommand installing the [[Relink|$:/plugins/flibbles/relink]] plugin as well, as it makes renaming projects much more convenient.

* [[$:/plugins/flibbles/relink]]

! Plugin

Drag&drop the following link into your wiki

* [[$:/plugins/nico/pm]]

Then save & reload your wiki.

! Getting started

Transclude the Dashboard tiddler into another tiddler like the following:

```
{{$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/Dashboard}}
```

See [[Usage|$:/plugins/nico/pm/usage]] for more information.
$:/plugins/nico/pm/installation.title: $:/plugins/nico/pm/installation

$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/QuickCapture.text:
!! Quick add todo

<$keyboard key="enter">
  <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/state/Inbox!!todo_name}} tags="Inbox" status="todo"/>
  <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/Inbox" todo_name=""/>
  <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/>
  <$edit-text class="pm-input input-large" tiddler="$:/state/Inbox" field="todo_name" placeholder="Add to inbox..." focus="true"/> 
  <label class="pm-label">Press ‚èé to capture</label>
</$keyboard>
$:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/QuickCapture.title: $:/plugins/nico/pm/ui/QuickCapture
